English
In RoboCop, the year is 2028 and multinational conglomerate OmniCorp is at the
center of robot technology. Overseas, their drones have been used by the military
for years - and it's meant billions for OmniCorp's bottom line. Now OmniCorp wants
to bring their controversial technology to the home front, and they see a golden
opportunity to do it. When Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) - a loving husband, father
and good cop doing his best to stem the tide of crime and corruption in Detroit -
is critically injured in the line of duty, OmniCorp sees their chance for a
part-man, part-robot police officer. OmniCorp envisions a RoboCop in every city
and even more billions for their shareholders, but they never counted on one thing:
there is still a man inside the machine pursuing justice.
